resources: Which of the following statements defines adverse selection in relation to insurance? "Which of the following is NOT usually given as a reason why firms form strategic alliances?" Third degree price discrimination refers to the situation where: "Good X has a cross elasticity of demand with respect to Good Y which is equal to minus unity (i.e. –1). Good X is which of the following with respect to Good Y?" Which of the following is NOT a characteristic of an inferior good? "If the government chooses to use resources to build a hospital instead of a school, this illustrates the concept of:" "Which of the following is NOT a motive for advertising by an existing firm in an industry?" Which of the following statements about short run costs of production is FALSE? A firm that produces a main product and a by-product will maximise profits if it: Which of the following statements is FALSE? "When a monopolist maximises profits, price exceeds marginal revenue. The difference between price and marginal revenue occurs because:" "Which one of the following characteristics applies to an oligopolistic market structure?" "An implicit or explicit agreement amongst firms in an industry NOT to compete with each other is known as:" "Which of the following will result in an improvement in the domestic country’s terms of trade?" "Which one of the following will occur, assuming spare capacity within the economy, if both government spending and the money supply are increased:" "Which one of the following is NOT a “crowding out” effect resulting from a fiscal expansion?" The socially efficient output for a monopoly is at the point where: "Which of the following would constitute a supply side economic policy for reducing unemployment?" "A government’s attempts to increase the monetary base (narrow money supply) through open market operations are likely to cause short term interest rates to:" "The nominal rate of interest is 2% and the expected rate of inflation is positive at 3%. Which one of the following is TRUE?" "All other things being equal, which of the following events would cause the value of Country A’s currency to appreciate against the value of Country B’s currency?" "If the central bank has to intervene in the foreign exchange markets to prevent the domestic currency from appreciating, then its foreign exchange reserves will:" "The unemployment rate, expressed as a percentage, is given by the number of unemployed divided by:" "If unemployment is above the natural level, the long run Phillips curve would suggest that, other things remaining the same, real wages would:" The Phillips curve shows that: "Which of the following does NOT form part of a country’s Gross Domestic Product (GDP)?"
